de.frauas.jdemandmodel.appliance

Class ApplianceData

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.frauas.jdemandmodel.appliance.ApplianceData

  • public class ApplianceData
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates five attributes of an appliance:

    ON power: power[W] when the appliance is turned on

    OFF power: power[W] when the appliance is turned off

    cycle time: time[min] a cycle of this appliance being turned on lasts

    restart delay: time[min] to delay before this appliance can be turned on again after being turned off

    scale factor: probability scaling factor to achieve a certain amount of on-power-cycles per year

    Author:
    lukas

    • Constructor Detail

      • ApplianceData

        public ApplianceData(int onPower,
                     int offPower,
                     int cycleTime,
                     int restartDelay,
                     double scaleFactor,
                     double deviation)
        Constructs a new ApplianceData instance.
        Parameters:
        onPower - power[W] when the appliance is turned on
        offPower - power[W] when the appliance is turned off
        cycleTime - time[min] a cycle of this appliance being turned on lasts
        restartDelay - time[min] to delay before this appliance can be turned on again after being turned off
        scaleFactor - probability scaling factor to achieve a certain amount of on-power-cycles per year
        deviation - optional deviation to be added to onPower, use 0 for this value to have no effect
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if onPower is less than or equal to 0
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if offPower is less than 0
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the cycle time is less than or equal to 0
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the restart delay is less than 0
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the scale factor is less than 0 or greater than 1
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the deviation is less than -1 or greater than 1

    • Method Detail

      • getOnPower

        public int getOnPower()
        Returns:
        the power[W] when the appliance is turned on.

      • getOffPower

        public int getOffPower()
        Returns:
        the power[W] when the appliance is turned off (stand-by).

      • getCycleTime

        Returns:
        the time[min] an appliance will be turned on for.

      • getRestartDelay

        public int getRestartDelay()
        Returns:
        the delay[min] for the appliance to be turned on again after being turned off.

      • getScaleFactor

        public double getScaleFactor()
        Returns:
        the scale factor of the using probability.

      • print

        This method prints an overview of the appliance's data to the console.
